remarks.format: ## Remarks 凭据策略将确定是否发送时发送凭据网络资源，例如 Web 页面的内容。The credential policy determines whether to send credentials when sending a for a network resource, such as the content of a Web page. 如果发送凭据，可以尝试对客户端进行身份验证，而不是发送一个响应，指示客户端的凭据是必需收到请求时需要客户端身份验证服务器。If credentials are sent, servers that require client authentication can attempt to authenticate the client when the request is received instead of sending a response that indicates that the client's credentials are required. 虽然这省去了与服务器的往返过程，必须与通过网络发送凭据所固有的安全风险权衡这种性能提升。While this saves a round trip to the server, this performance gain must be balanced against the security risk inherent in sending credentials across the network. 目标服务器不需要客户端身份验证，时，最好不要发送凭据。When the destination server does not require client authentication, it is best not to send credentials. > [!NOTE] > 仅当调用策略或关联的请求已不是凭据`null`。 policies are invoked only if the or the that is associated with the request has credentials that are not `null`. 设置此策略具有未指定凭据的请求没有影响。Setting this policy has no effect on requests that do not specify credentials. 使用属性来设置策略。Use the property to set an policy. 处理身份验证请求将调用方法，然后再执行身份验证。The that handles authentication for the request will invoke the method before performing the authentication. 如果该方法返回`false`，不执行身份验证。If the method returns `false`, authentication is not performed. 策略会影响的所有实例使用当前的应用程序域中的非 null 凭据。An policy affects all instances of with non-null credentials in the current application domain. 策略不能在单个请求中重写。The policy cannot be overridden on individual requests. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示允许凭据以仅针对面向特定主机的请求发送此接口的实现。The following code example shows an implementation of this interface that permits credentials to be sent only for requests that target specific hosts. remarks.format: ## Remarks 之后已通过设置指定策略属性，处理身份验证的调用方法，然后再执行身份验证。After an policy has been specified by setting the property, the that handles authentication for a invokes the method before performing the authentication. 如果此方法返回`false`，不执行身份验证。If this method returns `false`, authentication is not performed. 原始请求已被重定向或需要进行代理身份验证时，所标识的资源`challengeUri`可以从请求中指定的资源不同。When the original request has been redirected or proxy authentication is required, the resource identified by `challengeUri` can be different from the requested resource that is specified in . 在重定向的情况下`challengeUri`包含实际目标。In the case of redirection, `challengeUri` contains the actual destination . 如果代理身份验证是必需的`challengeUri`包含需要客户端身份验证的代理服务器的地址。If proxy authentication is required, `challengeUri` contains the address of the proxy server that requires client authentication.
